definition: to join as a partner, friend, or companion
examples: They were closely associated with each other during the war.

definition: to join or connect together : combine
examples: particles of gold associated with heavy minerals

definition: to bring together or into relationship in any of various intangible ways (as in memory or imagination)
examples: She will always associate that place with her youth.

definition: to come or be together as partners, friends, or companions
examples: was accused of associating with known criminals

definition: to combine or join with other parts : unite
examples: Protons, neutrons, and electrons associate together to form atoms.

definition: one associated with another: such as

examples: a close associate during his college years

definition: an entry-level member (as of a learned society, professional organization, or profession)
examples: an associate of the Royal Academy

definition: a degree conferred especially by a junior college
closely connected (as in function or office) with another : sharing in responsibility or authority
closely related especially in the mind
